title: CNN Baseline - iWildCam 2019
description: CNN Baseline - iWildCam 2019Breakdown of this notebook:  Loading the 32x32 dataset: Load the data generated in Reducing Image Sizes to 32x32. Create Callback for F1 Score: F1-macro score is the official metric of the competition. We create a callback to keep track of that value as we train the model. Creating and Training the Model: Create a simple model (taken from the official Keras tutorial) and train it. Evaluation: Display the plots from the training history. Submission: Run predictions with model.predict, and create submission csv file.  References cifar10_cnn_keras.py: Heavily inspired from this tutorial created by the Keras team. The architecture and training process is directly taken from them. Keras CNN Starter - PetFinder: History plot and submission are inspired by this kernel Reducing Image Sizes to 32x32: Image data (X_train, X_test) come from the output of this kernel. How to compute f1 score for each epoch in Keras: Needed to compute the F1 Score after each epoch.
